acl_counter.description: User object to retreive counters from an ACL entry. First create this counter object and then assign as counter_handle attribute in acl_entry object

label.description: Acl range label. The switch implementation allocates a label for all ranges. This label is eventually used to match in the ACL tables

acl_entry.description: Create and ACL entry object. ACL entry fields are provided as Value/Mask pair

table_handle.description: ACL table handle. Add this ACL entry into this table

eth_type.description: EtherType value. This is a match field

eth_type_mask.description: EtherType mask. This is a match field

src_mac.description: Source MAC address. This is a match field

src_mac_mask.description: Source MAC address mask. This is a match field

dst_mac.description: Destination MAC address. This is a match field

dst_mac_mask.description: Destination MAC address mask. This is a match field

src_ip.description: Source IP address. This is a match field

src_ipv6_word3.description: Source IPv6 address [127:96] word3. This is a match field

src_ipv6_word2.description: Source IPv6 address [95:64] word2. This is a match field

src_ip_mask.description: Source IP address mask. This is a match field

src_ipv6_mask_word3.description: Source IPv6 address [127:96] mask word3. This is a match field

src_ipv6_mask_word2.description: Source IPv6 address [95:64] mask word2. This is a match field

dst_ip.description: Destination IP address. This is a match field

dst_ipv6_word3.description: Destination IPv6 address [127:96] word3. This is a match field

dst_ipv6_word2.description: Destination IPv6 address [95:64] word2. This is a match field

dst_ip_mask.description: Destination IP address mask. This is a match field

dst_ipv6_mask_word3.description: Destination IPv6 address [127:96] mask word3. This is a match field

dst_ipv6_mask_word2.description: Destination IPv6 address [95:64] mask word2. This is a match field

ip_proto.description: IP protocol This is a match field

ip_proto_mask.description: IP protocol mask. This is a match field

ip_frag.description: IP fragmentation flags. This is a match field

ip_dscp.description: DSCP. This is a match field.

ip_dscp_mask.description: DSCP mask. This is a match field.

ip_ecn.description: ECN. This is a match field.

ip_ecn_mask.description: ECN mask. This is a match field.

tcp_flags.description: TCP flags. This is a match field.

tcp_flags_mask.description: TCP flags mask. This is a match field.

l4_src_port.description: L4 source port. This is a match field.

l4_src_port_mask.description: L4 source port mask. This is a match field.

l4_dst_port.description: L4 destination port. This is a match field.

l4_dst_port_mask.description: L4 destination port mask. This is a match field.

icmp_type.description: ICMP type. This is a match field. If l4_src_port attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

icmp_type_mask.description: ICMP type mask. This is a match field. If l4_src_port_mask attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

icmp_code.description: ICMP code. This is a match field. If l4_src_port attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

icmp_code_mask.description: ICMP code mask. This is a match field. If l4_src_port_mask attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

icmpv6_type.description: ICMPv6 type. This is a match field. If l4_src_port attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

icmpv6_type_mask.description: ICMPv6 type mask. This is a match field. If l4_src_port_mask attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

icmpv6_code.description: ICMPv6 code. This is a match field. If l4_src_port attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

icmpv6_code_mask.description: ICMPv6 code mask. This is a match field.If l4_src_port_mask attribute is non-zero, this attribute is discarded.

arp_tpa.description: ARP target protocol address. This is a match field

arp_tpa_mask.description: ARP target protocol address mask. This is a match field

src_port_range_id.description: Source port range handle. This is a match field.

dst_port_range_id.description: Destination port range handle. This is a match field.

port_lag_label.description: Port or LAG label match field. This field is automatically set internally if bind_point_type is either PORT/LAG

port_lag_label_mask.description: Port or LAG label mask match field. This field is automatically set internally if acl_table bind_point_type is either PORT/LAG

bd_label.description: BD label match field. This field is automatically set internally if acl_table bind_point_type is either VLAN/RIF

bd_label_mask.description: BD label mask match field. This field is automatically set internally if acl_table bind_point_type is either VLAN/RIF

outer_vlan_pri_mask.description: outer Vlan priority mask match field

outer_vlan_cfi_mask.description: outer Vlan cfi mask match field

tunnel_vni.description: Tunnel VNI. This is a match field

tunnel_vni_mask.description: Tunnel VNI mask. This is a match field

port_vlan_miss.description: Port VLAN lookup miss. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

port_vlan_miss_mask.description: Mask for Port VLAN lookup miss. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

acl_deny.description: ACL action deny. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

acl_deny_mask.description: ACL action deny mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

racl_deny.description: Routing ACL deny action. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

racl_deny_mask.description: Routing ACL deny mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

rmac_hit.description: Router MAC hit. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

rmac_hit_mask.description: Mask for Router MAC hit. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

myip.description: Router (my) IP address. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

myip_mask.description: Router (my) IP address mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

same_if_check.description: Same interface check. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

same_if_check_mask.description: Same interface check mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

same_bd_check.description: Same BD check mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

same_bd_check_mask.description: Same BD check mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

stp_state.description: Spanning tree state. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

stp_state_mask.description: Spanning tree state mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

ipv4_unicast_enable.description: IPV4 unicast enable. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

ipv4_unicast_enable_mask.description: IPV4 unicast enable mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

ipv6_unicast_enable.description: IPV6 unicast enable. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

ipv6_unicast_enable_mask.description: IPV6 unicast enable mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

sample_packet.description: Enable copy to CPU for sflow packets. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

sample_packet_mask.description: Enable copy to CPU for sflow packets mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

l3_mtu.description: L3 MTU value. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in egress direction

l3_mtu_mask.description: L3 MTU mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in egress direction

ttl.description: TTL. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in egress direction

ttl_mask.description: TTL mask. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in egress direction

pkt_type.description: Packet type (B/U/M). This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

pkt_type_mask.description: Packet type (B/U/M) mask. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

arp_opcode.description: ARP opcode type. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

arp_opcode_mask.description: ARP opcode type mask. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

ingress_port_lag_handle.description: Ingress port or LAG handle. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction.

routed.description: Enable/Disable routed check. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

routed_mask.description: Enable/Disable routed check mask. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

nat_miss_type.description: Match on NAT miss type. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

nat_miss_type_mask.description: Match on NAT miss type mask. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

user_metadata.description: Match on user metadata passed on from previous ACL stage. This is a match field in egress direction only. Valid only when ACL_USER_META_ENABLE feature is enabled in the P4 profile.

user_metadata_mask.description: Match on user metadata mask. This is a match field in egress direction only. Valid only when ACL_USER_META_ENABLE feature is enabled in the P4 profile.

in_out_ports_group_label.description: port group label internally generated when in_ports or out_ports are present.

in_out_ports_group_label_mask.description: port group label mask internally generated when in_ports or out_ports are present.

in_ports.description: Port handle list. This field is used to in-ports acl feature.

out_ports.description: Port handle list. This field is used to out-ports acl feature.

priority.description: ACL entry priority. This is a match field.

egress_port_lag_handle.description: Egress port or LAG handle. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in egress direction.

action_counter_handle.description: ACL counter handle. This is not a match or action field. It is used to bind an ACL counter object to this entry to retreive counters. This is to satisfy SAI object model. An application can directly query this object for counters

action_ingress_mirror_handle.description: Set mirror session handle. This is an action parameter field. set_mirror action is used for the entry's action if this attribute is valid.

action_egress_mirror_handle.description: Set mirror session handle. This is an action parameter field. set_mirror action is used for the entry's action if this attribute is valid.

action_set_vrf_handle.description: Set VRF field. This is an action parameter field. set_vrf action is used for the entry's action if this attribute is valid. It is valid when acl_table type is PREINGRESS

action_set_tc.description: Set TC field. This is an action parameter field. set_tc action is used for the entry's action if this attribute is non-zero

action_set_outer_vlan_pri.description: Set PCP field. This is an action parameter field. set_outer_pri action is used for the entry's action if this attribute is non-zero

action_set_dscp.description: Set DSCP field. This is an action parameter field. set_dscp action is used for the entry's action if this attribute is non-zero

action_set_ecn.description: Set ECN field. This is an action parameter field.

action_set_color.description: Packet color. This is an action parameter field. set_color action is used for the entry's action if this attribute is valid

queue_id.description: Set CPU rx queue id field. Valid for REDIRECT and COPY to CPU actions. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

action_report_type.description: Set DTEL Report type (Drop/Queue/Flow). This field is valid only for DTE_REPORT and IFA_CLONE_AND_DTEL_REPORT dtel action types only.

action_report_all_packets.description: DTEL report all packets and ignore suppression. This field is valid only for DTE_REPORT and IFA_CLONE_AND_DTEL_REPORT dtel action types only.

action_disable_nat.description: Disable Destination/Source/Flow NAT lookup. This field is valid for ACL_NO_NAT action only.

sample_session_handle.description: Sample session handle. This field is valid for IFA_CLONE and IFA_CLONE_AND_DTEL_REPORT actions only.

cpu_redirect_reason_code.description: Set CPU trap reason for action type REDIRECT_TO_CPU/COPY_TO_CPU. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

drop_reason.description: Set drop reason code for action type DROP. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction

set_user_metadata.description: Set user metadata. This information is carried to subsequent ACL stages. This is an action paramter field. This field is valid for PERMIT, REDIRECT_TO_CPU and COPY_TO_CPU packet actions at INGRESS only.

action_hostif_user_defined_trap_handle.description: Set hostif user defined trap ID field. This is an action parameter field. This field is valid for PERMIT, REDIRECT_TO_CPU and COPY_TO_CPU packet actions only.

action_meter_handle.description: Meter handle. This is an action parameter field. This field is valid for PERMIT, REDIRECT_TO_CPU and COPY_TO_CPU packet actions only.

packet_action.description: ACL entry packet action. All of the below actions are not supported for all ACL table types. Some actions are only supported in specific P4 profiles.

redirect.description: Object handle for REDIRECT action. This is an action parameter field. Based on the object type, redirect_port or redirect_nexthop is used for the entry's action.

dtel_action_type.description: DTEL ACL entry action list. All of the below actions are not supported for all ACL table types. Some actions are only supported in specific P4 profiles.

ingress_rif.description: Ingress RIF handle. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in ingress direction.

egress_rif.description: Egress RIF handle. This is a match field. Applicable only for acl_table attr bind_point_type SWITCH in egress direction.

bind_point_attach.description: Becomes true once acl_table is attached to any bind_point (port/lag/vlan/rif/switch), otherwise false

acl_label.description: ACL label internally generated when bind point is not NONE. This will be used to set the port or bd label when this object is passed as a acl_handle to port, lag, vlan, rif

acl_label_mask.description: ACL label mask internally generated when bind point is not NONE. This will be used to set the port or bd label mask when this object is passed as a acl_handle to port, lag, vlan, rif

acl_groups.description: List of ACL groups this table is attached to

acl_entry_handles.description: List of ACL entries in this table

acl_type_port_group_value.description: Port group value based on the MAC/V4/V6/Mirror position

port_group_index.description: Port group index derived based on the list of ACL table bind points

use_port_group_index.description: Use port_group_index or port_lag_index in the rules

port_lag_handle.description: Port/Lag handle when ACL table is bound to only one Port/Lag

bind_point_attach.description: Becomes true once acl_group is attached to any bind_point (port/lag/vlan/rif/switch), otherwise false

acl_label.description: ACL label internally generated when bind point is not NONE. This will be used to set the port or bd label when this object is passed as a acl_handle to port, lag, vlan, rif

acl_label_mask.description: ACL label mask internally generated when bind point is not NONE. This will be used to set the port or bd label when this object is passed as a acl_handle to port, lag, vlan, rif
